S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3844: ASSERT failure in BasePage.unlatch() when running LobStreamsTest
Rewrote test to only call getX once per column per row, as calling for instance getBlob twice on a given column on the same row will be disallowed. Also removed some unused code.
Patch file: derby-3844-2a-jdbcdriver_test_rewrite.diff
